channel.title: Java problem
channel.description:
can someone please help me, i updated my java on my computer but now it says this when i open my run.bat
has value 1.8 but 1.7 is required.

item.title: Java problem
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You know, it’s 100% easier with Environmental Variables. I’m just saying.
http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/essential/environment/paths.html

Read full topic

item.title: Java problem
item.dc:creator: @angle2000555 angle2000555
item.description:
@angle2000555 wrote:

[quote=“maul ownz, post:5, topic:546033”][quote author=angle2000555 link=topic=664925.msg4444963#msg4444963 date=1408302746]

Hmm, could be the run code or the client, whats the code in the run.bat file?

@echo off
title Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

i tried so much things i delted java and installed again but it wont work

Maybe change the java to something like this "C:\Program Files\Java\Your Java Here\bin\java"
So the run.bat code will look like this:

@echo off title Server "C:\Program Files\Java\Your Java Here\bin\java" -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

[/quote]it works, Thank you so much!![/quote]
Your Welcome, just ask if you need anymore help.

Read full topic

@echo off
title Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

i tried so much things i delted java and installed again but it wont work
[/quote]

Maybe change the java to something like this "C:\Program Files\Java\Your Java Here\bin\java"
So the run.bat code will look like this:

@echo off title Server "C:\Program Files\Java\Your Java Here\bin\java" -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause[/quote]it works, Thank you so much!!
